recipes.title: Black Bean and Rice Enchiladas
recipes.description: These vegetarian black bean and rice enchiladas are just as satisfying as those served in restaurants.

recipes.title: Basil and Pesto Hummus
recipes.description: This deliciously-sweet hummus is bursting with basil and an all-around pesto body.

recipes.title: Banana Oatmeal Cookie
recipes.description: This recipe has been handed down in my family for generations. It's a good way to use overripe bananas. It's also a moist cookie that travels well either in the mail or car.

recipes.title: World's Best Lasagna
recipes.description: It takes a little work, but it is worth it.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Korma
recipes.description: This is an easy and exotic Indian dish. It's rich, creamy, mildly spiced, and extremely flavorful. Serve with naan and rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.description: This dish combines the nutty flavor of brown rice with the fresh taste of bell peppers, baby peas, and other vegetables.

recipes.title: Marinated Grilled Shrimp
recipes.description: A very simple and easy marinade that makes your shrimp so yummy you don't even need cocktail sauce.

recipes.title: Homemade Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.description: These enchiladas are great. Even my 5 year old loves them!

recipes.title: Homemade Black Bean Veggie Burgers
recipes.description: You will never want to eat frozen veggie burgers again. These are so easy, and you'll be proud to have created such a vegetarian delight.

recipes.title: Four Cheese Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: This is a fantastic version of an Italian classic. The feta cheese adds a rich flavor that brings this dish to life. Incredibly easy and incredibly delicious!

recipes.title: Divine Hard-Boiled Eggs
recipes.description: These hard-boiled eggs are cooked perfectly every time without turning the yolks green.
